rules.ruleString: (Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS1172, KOR1020, KOR1120} and  Incompatible with course version org unit in {50000561} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT} and  Incompatible with course version in {0080, 0082, 0116, 0170, 0530, 0542, 0660, 0978, 0980, 1053, 1054, 1055, 1138, 1185, 1208, 1209, 1210, 1211, 1260, 1262, 1377, 1497, 1541, 1620, 1641, 1733, 1791, 1800, 1804, 1807, 1880, 1941, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 2025, 2317, 3199, 3237, 3238, 3239, 3426} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT})
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1171, ATS2171}

proh: Students enrolled in Arts courses are prohibited from taking this unit. In addition, students enrolled in this unit are prohibited from taking ATS1172.
description: Building on the foundation established in Korean Introductory 1, students will continue to develop their ability to communicate in routine social situations. They will also be introduced to various learning strategies that aim to help them develop a sense of control over their own learning, leading to a lifetime of learning.
